H0.text: A polygraph is more popularly called a. Lie Detector

H1.text: A polygraph is more popularly called a. Truth Meter

H2.text: A polygraph is more popularly called a. Deception Test

H3.text: A polygraph is more popularly called a. PCASS

A4.text: A polygraph, often incorrectly referred to as a lie detector test
